CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Nova Industries relative to Starburst Enterprises?
SRP.A: Nova Industries is {above} Starburst Enterprises in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Starburst Enterprises relative to Nova Industries?
SRP.A: Starburst Enterprises is {below} Nova Industries in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total patent applications?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Nova Industries}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total patent applications?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Starburst Enterprises}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Starburst Enterprises's maximum Patent Applications in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Starburst Enterprises's maximum Patent Applications is in {2008}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Nova Industries's maximum Patent Applications in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Nova Industries's maximum Patent Applications is in {1996}.

NC.Q: Between 1988 and 2006, was the average total Patent Applications higher or lower than between 1995 and 2003?
NC.A: The average total patent applications between 1988 and 2006 was {higher} than between 1995 and 2003.

NC.Q: Was the total Patent Applications in 1986 higher or lower than in 2010?
NC.A: The total patent applications in 1986 was {higher} than in 2010.

NC.Q: Between 1989 and 2003, did the total Patent Applications experience a larger or smaller change than between 1985 and 2010?
NC.A: The change in total patent applications between 1989 and 2003 was {smaller} than between 1985 and 2010.

NC.Q: Between 2000 and 2005, was the average total Patent Applications higher or lower than between 1997 and 2003?
NC.A: The average total patent applications between 2000 and 2005 was {lower} than between 1997 and 2003.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Starburst Enterprises} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Starburst Enterprises and Nova Industries first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Starburst Enterprises and Nova Industries first exchanged leading positions in {1986}.
